results.name: Column 1 of triangle A101494.
comment: a(n) is the number of m-tuples of nonnegative integers in which n-m+1 is the maximum and appears exactly once. - _Mathew Englander_, Apr 11 2021
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..590
Mathew Englander, Comments on A101494 and A089246, and related sequences
program: (Sage) [sum((k+1)*(n-k)^k for k in (0..n)) for n in (0..30)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 05 2019
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 21 2005
